content: the bobble once counter clockwise and pull slightly version 2 - k1 yo k1 into the same st turn work purl 3 sts turn work knit 3 sts turn work purl 3 sts turn work sl1 knitwise 2 times sl1 purlwise pass 2 sts over last st with yarn in front wrap yarn around the base of the bobble once counter clockwise and pull slightly fleur page 5 - www espacetricot com - © espace tricot 2020 - for personal use only
